verses.roman:
ucca kari' śravaṇe kare nāma-saṅkīrtana
aneka-kṣaṇe mahāprabhu pāilā cetana

synonyms: ucca kari'-very loudly; śravaṇe—in the ears; kare—perform; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the holy name; aneka-kṣaṇe—after a considerable time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; pāilā cetana—returned to consciousness.
translation: All the devotees began to chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra very loudly, and after a considerable time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu regained consciousness.
